title: Report Glitched :/
body:
Hi, I'm not sure if this is the right place but I'd like to report somebody through this (I guess).

Basically, I had a game with an incredibly toxic Yasuo top, who constantly raged at our jungler for not ganking him, and started berating me as well for trying to calm the situation, saying that I was a noob for losing the lead that I got despite him ending 5-11.

Anyway, the report is on _Name Removed_ he was incredibly rude, talked only in all caps, and had a Bronze V "I'm feeding but it's my team's fault" attitude

replies.body:
Always get people who think they are playing for a solid gold spoon at the end, it's even funnier when they rage in norms because it's even less important.
I use to enjoy watching people rage/hate/flame at their team, and would always try make them rage harder for funs.
But after a while you realize you're just lowering to their level of toxicity. Muting chat or just not even looking at it is the norm for me now.
So long as there is a digital barrier between players, keyboard warriors will continue to warmonger like being better at a computer game will earn you some sort of high class super model and a successful lifestyle.

Hey man,

Firstly, I'm sorry about your bad experience. It's always disheartening to see some players still choose to act this way :(

> **As for your report;** 
> You can send in a support ticket [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Make sure explain what happened and provide as much evidence as you can. Linking stuff like the game where the toxic behavior occurred is really handy for them. You can use the [Match History](http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/) site to help you with this.
 


I hope this helps!
You aren't allowed to name and shame here bro, probably remove the name. Also, I think you need a support ticket or something, wait for someone else to confirm that
